key.name: hot-corner
key.summary: Keep hot corner sensitive when panel is hidden
key.description: Set to "true" to keep hot corner sensitive even when panel is in hidden state. Set to "false" to get rid of the hot corner in hidden state.

key.name: mouse-sensitive
key.summary: Show panel when mouse approaches edge of the screen
key.description: Set to "true" to show panel not only in overview but also when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.

key.name: mouse-sensitive-fullscreen-window
key.summary: Also show panel when mouse approaches edge of the screen when fullscreen
key.description: Set to "true" to also show panel when mouse approaches edge of the screen when windows are in fullscreen mode.

key.name: animation-time-autohide
key.summary: Slide animation time when mouse approaches edge of the screen
key.description: Amount of time it takes to slide the panel in/out when the mouse approaches the edge of the screen.

key.name: pressure-threshold
key.description: Number of pixels the mouse has to overrun in order to trigger the pressure barrier.

key.name: pressure-timeout
key.description: Amount of time before pressure barrier is triggered.

key.name: enable-active-window
key.summary: Enable Autohide only for active window
key.description: When enabled, the panel will only hide if the active window takes the space.

key.name: show-in-overview
key.description: When enabled, the panel will be visible in overview.
